sect1.title: Available Documentation
sect1.para: The following documentation is available for &obsa;:

listitem.para: This guide offers information about the initial setup and maintenance for running &obs; instances.
This guide describes basic workflows for working with packages on &obs;. This includes checking out a package from an upstream project, creating patches, branching a repository, and more.
This guide offers step-by-step instructions for the most common features of the &obs; and the &osbs;.
This guide covers ideas and motivations, concepts and processes of the &obs; and also covers administration topics.
This guide is intended for users and developers who want to dig deeper into &obs;. It contains information on backgrounds, setting up your computer for working with &obsa;, and usage scenarios.
